name: Long Live To Flower
description:
Long Live to Flower is a simple game, you just need to keep the plant alive so it can grow strong and happy :D

This proyect was made for the Ludum Dare 46, programmed in C++ using Raylib
Sprites made with Piskel

Github Project

https://github.com/fermingimpel/LongLiveToFlower
